PATIENT_ID: TEST_DVT_ADULT_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-11 08:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-11 08:10:00
Category I trauma activation for 45-year-old male. MVC with multiple injuries.
Trauma admission confirmed. Age 45.
BP 108/68, HR 102, RR 20, GCS 15.
No active bleeding on arrival. Bleeding status: controlled.
Coagulation studies normal. INR 1.1. No prior anticoagulation.
No intracranial hemorrhage suspected.

[NURSING_NOTE] 2026-02-11 08:30:00
Admitted to surgical ICU. Length of stay anticipated > 24 hours. Admitted.
No planned surgery within 24 hours. No operative plan currently.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-11 20:00:00
DVT prophylaxis initiated. Enoxaparin 40 mg started at 12 hours post-arrival.
Chemical DVT prophylaxis ordered per protocol.
LOS > 24 hours confirmed. No contraindications to chemical prophylaxis.
